get.description: The authentication token endpoint allows developers to retrieve a public auth token required to redirect a user to the Brick user interface and retrieve data afterward. The access token will be live for 30 minutes. In the brick user interface, An end-user of our partner can choose the institution of their choice and securely log in to their financial institution to verify their account. Other APIs can be used to fetch specific data on a need to need basis.

parameters.description: Username for clients(You can collect this from Brick dashboard)

parameters.description: Password for client(You can collect this from Brick dashboard)
